verses.name: Judges 9:13
verses.text: And the vine said unto them, Should I leave my wine, which cheereth God and man, and go to be promoted over the trees?

verses.name: Judges 9:14
verses.text: Then said all the trees unto the bramble, Come thou, and reign over us.

verses.name: Judges 9:15
verses.text: And the bramble said unto the trees, If in truth ye anoint me king over you, then come and put your trust in my shadow: and if not, let fire come out of the bramble, and devour the cedars of Lebanon.
